entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:34 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 5:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: E 47 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow changing to periods of rain or snow mixed with ice pellets this evening then to snow near midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
